channel.title: Need help adding teleport button
channel.description: ok under emote list i want to add a button called "pk" and so it teleports you to a certain place can anyone tell me how to does this i would be very greatfull

item.title: Need help adding teleport button
item.dc:creator: @_Kaos [Kaos]
item.description:
@_Kaos wrote:

Search for

public void initialize()

Close to the bottom of that void you should see, if not just either do the next step or add it yourself.

sendFrame126("emote 1", 180);//first emote slot sendFrame126("emote ",181); sendFrame126("emote ", 178); sendFrame126("emote ",175); sendFrame126("emote ",177); sendFrame126("emote ",182); sendFrame126("emote ",185); sendFrame126("emote ",186);

“emote” would be the output in this circumstance. Change it to what you like.

If you don’t see that then search for

refreshEmotes()

There you should see to the similar above.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help adding teleport button
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

[quote=“leetzone, post:2, topic:166844”]I have this

public void refreshEmotes() {
int p = playerRights;
sendQuest("@whi@Home", 180);
sendQuest("@whi@Train", 181);
sendQuest("@whi@Safe", 178);
sendQuest("@red@PK", 175);

public void emoteBow() // Pk { if(wildyLevel <= 20 && !teleblock && !CheckInCombat() && teleATimer == 0) { tele(3279,3512); sendMessage("Use Ancient teleports for deeper PKing!"); teleATimer = 30; } else if (wildyLevel > 20) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport out above level 20 Wilderness."); } else if (CheckInCombat()) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport in combat"); } else if (teleblock) { sendMessage("You are teleblocked!"); }[/quote]

completely wrong
try this

sendFrame126("@lre@Char", 180); sendFrame126("@lre@pk", 181); sendQuest("@gre@Level 90 : Heal", 1564); sendQuest("@whi@Heal Your Mate (Lunar)", 1565);

then this:

                        [code]case 170: // laugh emote
                            teleportToX = 3283;
                            teleportToY = 2343;
			break;[/code]

try this.it should work,if you know where to add them.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help adding teleport button
item.dc:creator: @leetzone leetzone
item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

I have this

public void refreshEmotes() {
int p = playerRights;
sendQuest("@whi@Home", 180);
sendQuest("@whi@Train", 181);
sendQuest("@whi@Safe", 178);
sendQuest("@red@PK", 175);

public void emoteBow() // Pk { if(wildyLevel <= 20 && !teleblock && !CheckInCombat() && teleATimer == 0) { tele(3279,3512); sendMessage("Use Ancient teleports for deeper PKing!"); teleATimer = 30; } else if (wildyLevel > 20) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport out above level 20 Wilderness."); } else if (CheckInCombat()) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport in combat"); } else if (teleblock) { sendMessage("You are teleblocked!"); }
